about.heading: The Best Way to Book Bus Ticket
about.paragraph: Do you want to know the best way to book tickets online securely and how to book tickets in advance?Travelly.com is the best online platform for bus ticket booking . You can find an affordable and cost-effective online travel bookings facility at travelly . With Travelly , online bus ticket booking is now very easy. You simply need to fill in the details of your journey when  our book tickets button clicked, select the bus that best suits your travel needs and securely complete your booking online on Travelly.com.We would recommend that you book your tickets at least 2 - 3 days in advance so that you can reserve bus seats as per your preference and get the best-discounted price on your booking.With Travelly , travellers can book bus tickets online at the lowest ticket fares. Travellers prefer to choose their favorite bus to reserve online bus booking. You are at the right place to find a wide range of Private buses and SRTC (State Road Transport Corporation) buses are available for bus booking online on Travelly.

help.heading: New bus ticket Booking Help
help.description: When clicking the book ticket  button , You can Enter the source and Destination locations and date  in the starting_point, destination and date tab respectively.After that you can see the bus details and the choose your bus and click the book button and after that you have to fill the form and submit.If you submit the form you can download the ticket by clicking print out this button
